lead_paragraph: Russia, already suspended from next month's Rio Paralympics, have also been banned for the winter edition in Pyeongchang, South Korea in 2018 because of a state-sponsored sports doping program.

headline.print_headline: Paralympics-Now Russia Banned From 2018 Winter Games
headline.main: Paralympics-Now Russia Banned From 2018 Winter Games
